adrFormatAddress: 3 E 71st St Suite 1C, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: I was so fortunate to be given the referral to Dr. Lisa Szubin. She is professional and a wonderfully compassionate physician who sticks with you until you are feeling better. I never feel rushed. Dr. Szubin takes as much time as you need.She listens to everything you say.The staff is the office are always cheery, and make you feel as if you are the only person in the office. Absolutely the best!

text.text: I was so fortunate to be given the referral to Dr. Lisa Szubin. She is professional and a wonderfully compassionate physician who sticks with you until you are feeling better. I never feel rushed. Dr. Szubin takes as much time as you need.She listens to everything you say.The staff is the office are always cheery, and make you feel as if you are the only person in the office. Absolutely the best!

originalText.text: Doctor Szubin was able to see me quickly, but did not listen to my concerns. She performed a $600 procedure without my consent and billed me accordingly. I was in her office for 10-15 minutes and was billed $1000 before insurance. I am extremely frustrated and will be telling my doctor that he should not be referring patients to Dr. Szubin.

text.text: Doctor Szubin was able to see me quickly, but did not listen to my concerns. She performed a $600 procedure without my consent and billed me accordingly. I was in her office for 10-15 minutes and was billed $1000 before insurance. I am extremely frustrated and will be telling my doctor that he should not be referring patients to Dr. Szubin.

originalText.text: After bring referred to three different doctors for a sinus surgery consultation - Dr. Szubin was the only one who talked with me, not at me. For such a big decision she treated me like an equal and an expert on my health and experience, making me a part of the process. The other surgeons barked their opinions at me without trying to get to know me or my history. It was such a relief to be heard!

text.text: After bring referred to three different doctors for a sinus surgery consultation - Dr. Szubin was the only one who talked with me, not at me. For such a big decision she treated me like an equal and an expert on my health and experience, making me a part of the process. The other surgeons barked their opinions at me without trying to get to know me or my history. It was such a relief to be heard!

originalText.text: Amazing doctor. Would highly recommend if you are looking for an ENT specialist. I am highly anxious and am the worst patient as a result. Dr. Szubin was so calming and helpful as she walked me through every step she took. I had a lot of pain and an issue that couldn’t easily be diagnosed. She did an amazing job getting the testing I needed very quickly - and helped resolve the issue / diagnose faster than most doctors could. I will always be going to her if I need an ENT.

originalText.text:
Dr. Szubin is incredible! I’ve been seeing her for years. She’s extremely knowledgeable, professional, and friendly. Had the best experience with her
A++
